text: Jack Griffo is an actor well known for acting as Max from the Thundermans. He is 28 years old and his birthday is 11 December 1996. He has played in movies and shows such as Alixe and Katie, Henry danger, Nicky Ricky,Dicky and Dawn. He has mainly been shown acting griff in nickelodeon tv shows and movies.
